hackathon-description-text: Last year, we were able to bring this culture to Phoenix, Arizona embodied in Desert Hacks and SWHacks and we want to continue expanding this innovative community. Our vision this year is to bring hackers of all backgrounds together for a 36-hour session of bringing their ideas to life. By attracting students from around the country to our annual hackathon, we will cultivate the local tech community and provide students brand new opportunities and connections.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Winning group members will each receive Amazon Echo and Github backpacks
Winning group members will each receive an Sony Extra Bass Smartphone Headset and a Github Octocat Figurine
Winning group members will each receive a 2nd Generation Chrome Casts and a Github sticker pack.
Winning group members will each receive a Fire HD 8 Tablet with Alexa
Winning group members will each receive a JBL Flip 4 Waterproof Portable Bluetooth Speaker.
Best use of technology to impact society in a positive way. Winning group members will each receive an Amazon Echo Dot.
Winning group members will each receive a Uctronics Primary Starter Kit for Arduino
VR for Good is about how we can use this technology for the good of humankind.  The prize will be Leap Motions and we plan to ship them to the winning team after Sun Hacks ends.
